scripts.clean: rm -rf dist; which ipconfig || killall -9 node || true; sleep 5
scripts.cpl-css: cd src && find . -iname "*.css" | while read f; do echo $f; d="`dirname $f`"; mkdir -p "../dist/$d"; cp $f "../dist/$d"; done
scripts.cpl-font: cd src && find . -iname "*.css" | while read f; do echo $f; d="`dirname $f`"; mkdir -p "../dist/$d"; cp $f "../dist/$d"; done
scripts.cpl-less: cd src && find . -iname "*.less" | while read f; do echo $f; mkdir -p "../dist/`dirname $f | sed -e 's/less/css/g'`"; lessc $f > "../dist/`echo $f | sed -e 's/less/css/g'`"; done
scripts.cpl-js: cd src && find . -iname "*.js" | while read f; do echo $f; d="`dirname $f`"; mkdir -p "../dist/$d"; cp $f "../dist/$d"; done
scripts.cpl-img-comment: cd src #&& find . \( -iname "*.jpg" -or -iname "*.gif" -or -iname "*.png" -or -iname "*.svg" \) | while read f; do echo $f; d="`dirname $f`"; mkdir -p "../dist/$d"; cp $f "../dist/$d"; done
scripts.precpl-jade: npm run cpl-less && npm run cpl-js
scripts.prew-cpl-jade: npm run w-cpl-less & npm run w-cpl-js &
scripts.watch-stop: ps aux | grep node | grep fsmonitor | awk '{ print $2 }' | while read f; do which ipconfig || kill -s 9 $f; done
scripts.server-stop: ps aux | grep node | egrep "express|live-reload" | awk '{ print $2 }' | while read f; do kill -s 9 $f; done
scripts.deploy-rsync: which rsync || { echo "No Rsync on windows dude!"; exit 1 }; rsync dist/* -e ssh root@gany.itmcd.ro:/home/stefysoft/www/planteaza-romania/www
